Field.label: Galaxy Classification
Field.description: Galaxy type: 0->Central, 1->Satellite, 2->Orphan

Field.label: X
Field.description: Position of host subhalo at snapshot when last identified

Field.label: Y
Field.description: Position of host subhalo at snapshot when last identified

Field.label: Z
Field.description: Position of host subhalo at snapshot when last identified

Field.label: X Velocity
Field.description: Comoving velocity of subhalo at last snapshot identified

Field.label: Y Velocity
Field.description: Comoving velocity of subhalo at last snapshot identified

Field.label: Z Velocity
Field.description: Comoving velocity of subhalo at last snapshot identified

Field.label: Snapshot Number
Field.description: Snapshot number in the simulation

Field.label: descendant
Field.description: Tree-local index of the descendant

Field.label: Merger Type
Field.description: Merger type: 0=none; 1=minor merger; 2=major merger; 3=disk instability; 4=disrupt to ICS

Field.label: Galaxy Age
Field.description: Time-step between this galaxy and parent

Field.label: Star Formation Rate in the Disk
Field.description: Star formation rate in the disk

Field.label: Star formation Rate in the Bulge
Field.description: Star formation rate in the bulge

Field.label: Avg. Metallicity of Star-forming Disk Gas
Field.description: Metallicty of star forming disk gas (averaged over timesteps between two snapshots)(Mass of metals)/(Mass of star forming disk gas)

Field.label: Avg. Metallicity of Star-forming Bulge Gas
Field.description: Metallicty of star forming bulge gas (averaged over timesteps between two snapshots)(Mass of metals)/(Mass of star forming bulge gas)

Field.label: Cold gas mass
Field.description: Mass of cold gas

Field.label: Metals Cold Gas Mass
Field.description: Mass of metals contained within cold gas component

Field.label: Disk scale length
Field.description: Scale length of the galaxy disk

Field.label: MBP ID
Field.description: Most-bound particle ID

Field.label: Galaxy ID
Field.description: Unique galaxy ID

Field.label: Galaxy Classification
Field.description: Galaxy type: 0->Central, 1->Satellite, 2->Orphan

Field.label: Central galaxy index
Field.description: Index of the central galaxy of the host FOF group

Field.label: Ghost galaxy flag
Field.description: Ghost galaxy flag: 0->Host identified, 1->Ghost

Field.label: Particle number
Field.description: Number of particles in host subhalo

Field.label: Maximum particle number
Field.description: Maximum number of particles in host subhalo

Field.label: Physics debug flags
Field.description: Debugging flags for physical recipes

Field.label: Subhalo spin
Field.description: Bullock style lambda parameter

Field.label: Mvir
Field.description: Virial mass of host subhalo

Field.label: Rvir
Field.description: Virial radius of host subhalo

Field.label: Vvir
Field.description: Virial velocity of host subhalo

Field.label: Vmax
Field.description: Maximum circular velocity of host subhalo

Field.label: FOF virial mass
Field.description: Virial mass of the host friends-of-friends group

Field.label: Hot gas mass
Field.description: Mass of hot gas

Field.label: Hot metals mass
Field.description: Mass of metals contained within hot gas component

Field.label: Cooling mass
Field.description: Mass of baryons cooling onto the galaxy in current timestep

Field.label: Disk scale length
Field.description: Scale length of the galaxy disk

Field.label: Stellar mass
Field.description: Galaxy stellar mass

Field.label: Gross stellar mass
Field.description: Galaxy stellar mass excluding SN mass loss

Field.label: Stellar metals
Field.description: Mass of metals in stellar component

Field.label: Total Star Formation Rate
Field.description: Galaxy star formation rate

Field.label: Ejected gas
Field.description: Mass of gas ejected from system in current timestep

Field.label: Ejected metals
Field.description: Mass of metals in ejected component

Field.label: Black hole mass
Field.description: Currently unused

Field.label: Maximum reheated mass fraction
Field.description: Debugging property

Field.label: Maximum ejected mass fraction
Field.description: Debugging property

Field.label: Cooling radius
Field.description: Cooling radius

Field.label: Disk inclination
Field.description: Inclination of galaxy disk (random)

Field.label: Time remaining until merger
Field.description: Time remaining until merger

Field.label: Merger start radius
Field.description: Radius at which host halo lost

Field.label: Baryon fraction modifier
Field.description: Fractional modification to the infalling baryon mass due to photoionization supression from the UVB.

Field.label: Critical virial mass for photo supression
Field.description: The halo mass at which 50% of baronic infall would be supressed, given the intensity of the local UVB.

Field.label: Mass weighted mean stellar age
Field.description: The mass weighted mean stellar age of the galaxy

Field.label: New stars
Field.description: The stars formed in this snapshot.

Field.label: New stars
Field.description: The stars formed in current snapshot - 1.

Field.description: The stars formed in current snapshot - 2.

Field.description: The stars formed in current snapshot - 3.

Field.label: New stars
Field.description: The stars formed in current snapshot - 4.

Field.label: Descendant Galaxy Index
Field.description: Index for the descendant galaxy after a merger

Field.label: Descendant Snapshot
Field.description: Snapshot for the descendant galaxy

Field.label: UV1600 Rest Frame
Field.description: UV1600 Rest Frame
